parameters.query:
SELECT 
  c.id as case_id,
  c.case_number,
  c.catchy_case_id,
  c.project_title as case_title,
  c.slack_channel as slack_channel_id,
  b.id as brief_id,
  b.client, b.agency, b.brand, b.project_title,
  b.media, b.term, b.territory,
  b.budget_raw, b.budget_min, b.budget_max,
  b.exclusivity, b.exclusivity_details,
  b.brief_sender_name, b.brief_sender_email, b.brief_sender_role,
  b.creative_direction, b.mood, b.keywords, b.genres,
  b.mood_descriptors, b.reference_tracks, b.instruments,
  b.vocals_preference, b.must_avoid, b.lyrics_requirements,
  b.lengths, b.cutdowns, b.stems_required, b.sync_points,
  b.source_type, b.deliverable_formats, b.file_formats,
  b.language_adaptations,
  b.campaign_context, b.target_audience, b.brand_values,
  b.submission_deadline, b.first_presentation_date,
  b.client_presentation_date,
  b.ppm_date, b.shoot_date, b.offline_date, b.online_date,
  b.air_date, b.deadline_urgency,
  b.extraction_status, b.brief_quality, b.completion_rate,
  b.missing_information, b.extraction_notes,
  b.version
FROM tf_cases c
JOIN tf_briefs b ON b.case_id = c.id
WHERE CASE 
  WHEN $1 = 'case_id' THEN c.id = $2::uuid
  WHEN $1 = 'session_id' THEN b.session_id = $3
  ELSE FALSE
END
LIMIT 1;
